description: Is there any better combo than cheese and vegemite? Make your own moreish Vegemite scrolls at home with this easy recipe using ready-made dough balls.
name: Cheat's Vegemite Scrolls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut each log into 6 even slices. Working with 1 slice at a time, slightly flatten with your hands, then place, cut-side up, in pan. Spray with oil, then bake for 15 minutes or until golden. Cool for 5 minutes. Serve with sauce.
